parameters: So. I'd like to talk about, uh, yesterday's incident...

Yes, I wanted to help her!

Yuna, you managed to get stuck in the simplest trap, although you
should already be able to neutralize it in no time!
Not to mention your behavior! This can't be overlooked.
Therefore, your last practical assignment is cancelled, and you will
have to pass a new one to get a credit.
And you will have to do it together!
I'm too busy today, so I'll come up with your new assignment
tomorrow. And before that time behave yourselves! Dismissed!
